name: A Card to Play
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Target willing creature other than yourself has an action preordained. If it is a spell, it spends the MP to cast the spell, and it must cost 2 or fewer AP.

At any time over the spellâ€™s duration, you can cause the action to take place. The creature chooses all applicable targets and does not need AP for the action. It must be able to take the action, or the spell fails and is lost.

You can't target a creature with this spell again until it finishes a rest.
